sen.j: 『続拾遺和歌集』（しょくしゅういわかしゅう）は、建治2年（1276年）、亀山上皇の命によって編纂された12番目の勅撰和歌集。
sen.e: Shoku Shui Wakashu is the 12th imperial anthology of waka (Japanese poetry) by the command of the Retired Emperor Kameyama in 1276.
Shoku Shui Wakashu is the 12th imperial anthology of waka (Japanese poetry) by the command of the Retired Emperor Kameyama in 1276.
Shoku Shui Wakashu is the 12th imperial anthology of waka (Japanese poetry) by the command of the Retired Emperor Kameyama in 1276.

sen.j: 歌人は後嵯峨上皇、藤原為家、藤原定家、西園寺実氏、藤原俊成、藤原信実などで、約1500首を収める。
sen.e: It consists of about 1500 poems by poets including the Retired Emperor Gosaga, FUJIWARA no Tameie, FUJIWARA no Sadaie, Saneuji SAIONJI, FUJIWARA no Toshinari, and FUJIWARA no Nobuzane.
It consists of about 1500 poems by poets including the Retired Emperor Gosaga, FUJIWARA no Tameie, FUJIWARA no Sadaie, Saneuji SAIONJI, FUJIWARA no Toshinari, and FUJIWARA no Nobuzane.
It consists of about 1500 poems by poets including the Retired Emperor Gosaga, FUJIWARA no Tameie, FUJIWARA no Sadaie, Saneuji SAIONJI, FUJIWARA no Toshinari, and FUJIWARA no Nobuzane.

sen.j: 序がなく、また武士の歌も収録されているという。
sen.e: No preface was provided, but the anthology includes poems by samurai.
No preface was provided, but the anthology includes poems by samurai.
No preface was provided, but the anthology includes poems by samurai.
